lib Package¶

CommandLine Module¶

This program contains the command line UI for the ORMPY program.

lib.CommandLine.execute()[source]¶

Command line entry point for ORMPY program.

Constraint Module¶

This module provides a class for ORM constraints.

class lib.Constraint.Constraint[source]¶

Bases: object

An ORM Constraint.

FactType Module¶

This module provides a class for ORM fact types.

class lib.FactType.FactType[source]¶

Bases: object

An ORM Fact Type.

Model Module¶

This module provides a Model class to store a simplified ORM model consisting of a set of object types, a set of fact types, and a set of constraints.

class lib.Model.Model[source]¶

Bases: object

Simplified representation of an ORM model.

add(element)[source]¶

Add an element to the model.

get_constraint(name)[source]¶

Returns a constraint with a given name

get_fact_type(name)[source]¶

Returns a fact type with a given name

get_object_type(name)[source]¶

Returns an object type with a given name

num_constraints()[source]¶

Returns the number of constraints in the model.

num_fact_types()[source]¶

Returns the number of fact types in the model.

num_object_types()[source]¶

Returns the number of object types in the model.

NormaLoader Module¶

Module for importing .orm files produced by the NORMA modeling tool.

class lib.NormaLoader.NormaLoader(filename)[source]¶

Bases: object

Loads an .orm file produced by the NORMA modeling tool into a Model.Model. There are no public methods in this class. To load a model, just call:

loader = NormaLoader("/path/to/file/example.orm")
model = loader.model

The only other publically accessible attribute is the omissions list, which contains a list of model elements the loader ignored.

ObjectType Module¶

This module provides classes for the various object types in ORM: entity type, value type, and objectified type.

class lib.ObjectType.EntityType[source]¶

Bases: lib.ObjectType.ObjectType

An entity type is an object type that requires identification.

class lib.ObjectType.ObjectType[source]¶

Bases: object

Abstract class inherited by all object types.

class lib.ObjectType.ObjectifiedType[source]¶

Bases: lib.ObjectType.ObjectType

An objectified type is an object type that objectifies a fact type.

class lib.ObjectType.ValueType[source]¶

Bases: lib.ObjectType.ObjectType

A value type is a self-identifying object type.
